title: New Turner Cyclosys Ti gravel bike remains cyclocross ready, but with bigger tires
content:
Originally an aluminum cyclocross race bike, the 2022 Turner Cyclosys Ti switches materials and focus. With huge tire clearance and an updated geometry, it follows the trends into capable-yet-racy dirt road territory. The new frame is made of titanium with double-butted top and down tubes, tapered chainstays, and CNCâ€™d head tube and bottom bracket. But

The post New Turner Cyclosys Ti gravel bike remains cyclocross ready, but with bigger tires appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
